RT-SORT-LIMIT-EXCEEDED: Warning: sort limit exceeded, dropping points
RT-TIME-OUT-OF-ORDER: Warning: out-of-order assignment of time {badTime} after {goodTime}, point(s) dropped
RT-TOO-MANY-LOGS-WARNING: Warning: too many logs from {host}, throttling
RT-POINT-MISSING-TIME: Warning: point is missing a time in {field}
RT-TIMELESS-POINTS: Warning: encountered point(s) without the time field
RT-NO-FREE-TEXT: Error: Free text search is not implemented in this context.
RT-FREE-TEXT-STOCHASTIC: Error: Free text search is not implemented for stochastic adapter.
RT-INVALID-JSON-TIME-ERROR: Error: the time field must contain a number or a string representing time.
RT-INTEGER-REQUIRED-ERROR: Error: {argument} for {procName} must be an integer
RT-BATCH-INTERVAL-ERROR: Error: batch interval must be a positive number or duration.
RT-BATCH-INTERVAL-EVERY-ERROR: Error: Specify either batch -every or batch :interval:
RT-REDUCE-EVERY-ERROR: Error: reduce -every must be a positive duration.
RT-REDUCE-DELTA-ERROR: Error: delta cannot be used with reduce (use reduce last | put delta=delta())
RT-LAST-FROM-TO-ERROR: Error: -last option should not be combined with -from or -to
RT-MISSING-TIME-RANGE-ERROR: Error: One of -from, -to, or -last must be specified to define a query time range
RT-FORGET-BY-ERROR: Error: -forget option only applies when using "by"
RT-TO-BEFORE-FROM-MOMENT-ERROR: Error: -to must not be earlier than -from
RT-PACE-EVERY-X-ERROR: Error: Specify either output period with -every or time speedup with -x
RT-EMIT-TO-LIMIT-ERROR: Do not specify both -limit and -to or -last
RT-EMIT-POINTS-ARRAY-ERROR: emit -points wants an array of points
RT-EMIT-MIXED-POINTS-ERROR: emit -points must all have timestamps or have no timestamps
RT-EMIT-POINTS-FROM-ERROR: emit -points must not have timestamps when -from or -every is specified
RT-DURATION-OR-MOMENT-ERROR: Error: -{option} wants a duration or moment, got {value}
RT-INVALID-OFFSET-ERROR: Error: a duration is required for the offset.
RT-INVALID-SINK-OPTIONS-ERROR: Error: {procName} called with non-object argument to -o/-options
RT-JOIN-INPUTNUM-ERROR: Error: -{option} must be an input number (1, 2, ...).
RT-JOIN-ALL-TABLES-ERROR: Error: at least one input must not be a table
RT-JOIN-TABLE-OUTER-ERROR: -table and -outer cannot be specified for the same input
RT-JOIN-ZIP-ERROR: Error: -zip must be either true or a Duration.
RT-JOIN-ZIP-NEAREST-ERROR: Error: You cannot specify both -zip and -nearest.
RT-INVALID-MARKOV-ITEMS: Error: Markov items must all be numbers or all be strings
JUTTLE-RUNAWAY-PROGRAM: Not starting program as it would run forever with no output. {extra}
JUTTLE-DROPPED-TOPO: 'dropped' source must be followed by a linear topology
RT-PROGRAM-WITHOUT-FLOWGRAPH: Error: Cannot run a program without a flowgraph.
RT-PROC-CANNOT-START-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {proc} cannot be used at the start of a flowgraph.
RT-PROC-MUST-START-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {proc} can only be used at the start of a flowgraph.
RT-PROC-CANNOT-END-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {proc} cannot be used at the end of a flowgraph.
RT-PROC-MUST-END-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {proc} can only be used at the end of a flowgraph.
RT-WRONG-PROC-TYPE: Error: {proc} is a not a {type} proc.
RT-CANNOT-USE-AS-VARIABLE: Error: Cannot use a {thing} as a variable
RT-NON-TOPLEVEL-EXPORT: Error: Cannot export from within a {context}
RT-NON-TOPLEVEL-IMPORT: Error: Cannot import from within a {context}
RT-REDUCER-TOPLEVEL-STATEMENT: Error: Cannot use {thing} at the top level of a reducer.
RT-NOT-EXPORTED: Error: {thing} '{name}' is not exported by module {module}
RT-WRONG-ARG-COUNT-SINGULAR: Error: {type} {name} expects 1 argument but was called with {actual_count}
RT-WRONG-ARG-COUNT-PLURAL: Error: {type} {name} expects {expected_count} arguments but was called with {actual_count}
RT-WRONG-ARG-COUNT-RANGE: Error: {type} {name} expects {min_count} to {max_count} arguments but was called with {actual_count}
RT-ET-BAD-OPERAND: Error: The "{operator}" operator: {side} operand must be computable at compile-time.
RT-ET-BAD-FORMAT-1: Error: The "{operator}" operator: Must be in format "field {operator} expression".
RT-ET-BAD-FORMAT-2: Error: The "{operator}" operator: Must be in format "field {operator} expression" or "expression {operator} field".
RT-VARIABLE-NOT-ASSIGNABLE: Error: Variable "{name}" cannot be assigned to
RT-REDUCER-METHOD-ARGS: Error: Reducer method {name}() may not take arguments
RT-INVALID-POSTFIX-USE: Error: Invalid use of postfix operator {operator} with variable "{variable}"
RT-INVALID-POSTFIX-LHS: Error: Invalid left-hand side expression in postfix operation
RT-INVALID-PREFIX-USE: Error: Invalid use of prefix operator {operator} with variable "{variable}"
RT-PARAM-ORDER: Error: A required parameter cannot follow an optional parameter.
RT-BAD-INPUT-OPTION: Error: input {input} option {option} cannot be evaluated
RT-PROC-NEEDS-ARG: Error: The {name} processor needs an argument
RT-PROC-AFTER-SINK: Error: {proc} may not come after a sink
RT-PROC-BEFORE-SOURCE: Error: {proc} may not come before a source
RT-SUB-INVALID-ARG: Error: Subgraph {sub} called with invalid argument {arg}
RT-INVALID-OPERAND-TYPE: Error: The "{operator}" operator: Invalid operand type ({type}).
RT-IMPORT-INTERPOLATION: Error: Cannot use interpolation in imported module name.
RT-FIELD-NOT-STRING: Error: field {field} is not a string
RT-INVALID-OPTION-VALUE: Error: Invalid {option} option value, must be one of the following: {supported}
RT-INVALID-VIEW: Error: program refers to invalid client view "{view}"
RT-OPTION-SHOULD-BE-POSITIVE-INTEGER: Error: option {option} should be a positive integer
RT-INVALID-OPTION-COMBINATION: Error: option {option} can only be used with {rule}
